text: "Tunnel of Love" is a 1980 song by British rock band Dire Straits. It appears on their third studio album Making Movies. It went to number 54 in the United Kingdom, number 11 in Spain and number 7 in Italy. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Heartland rock songs Category:Pub rock songs Category:Art rock songs Category:Dire Straits songs
title: Tunnel of Love (Dire Straits song)
